channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: Taiwan Detects Six Chinese Aircraft Breaching Taiwan Strait Median Line
item.description: Taiwan’s military says it’s detected a total of 17 Chinese aircraft and ships around the country in the last 24 hours.

item.title: Earthquake Death Toll Rises to 15 After Two Bodies Found in Taroko National Park
item.description: Two more bodies, one male and one female, were found embracing each other in Taroko National Park's Shakadang Trail, bringing the death toll for the April 3 earthquake to 15.

item.title: Taiwan Introduces New Animal Identification Cards
item.description: Taiwan's Agriculture Ministry will introduce an ID card system to track the country's pets and help bring breeders in line with government regulations.

item.title: U.S.-Taiwan Bilateral Trade Pact at Top of Agenda: AmCham Chair
item.description: After the U.S. decided to switch recognition from Taipei to Beijing in 1979, the American Chamber of Commerce in Taiwan shifted its focus. TaiwanPlus spoke to current AmCham chair
